item.title: Card: Lightweight Text Formatting Language
item.description: More structure than unadorned text, less structure than XML. Generally intended to simplify writing and editing complex documents in a text editor.
item.content:encoded: More structure than unadorned text, less structure than XML. Generally intended to simplify writing and editing complex documents in a text editor.
